argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | rpnnen2.1 | |- F = ( x e. ~P NN |-> ( n e. NN |-> if ( n e. x , ( ( 1 / 3 ) ^ n ) , 0 ) ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ZZ>= ` M ) = ( ZZ>= ` M ) |
| 3 |  | #P_nnz | |- ( M e. NN -> M e. ZZ ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( A C_ NN /\ M e. NN ) -> M e. ZZ ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ( ( A C_ NN /\ M e. NN ) /\ k e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) -> ( ( F ` A ) ` k ) = ( ( F ` A ) ` k ) ) |
| 6 | 1 | #P_rpnnen2lem2 | |- ( A C_ NN -> ( F ` A ) : NN --> RR ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_ad2antrr | |- ( ( ( A C_ NN /\ M e. NN ) /\ k e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) -> ( F ` A ) : NN --> RR ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eluznn | |- ( ( M e. NN /\ k e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) -> k e. NN ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantll | |- ( ( ( A C_ NN /\ M e. NN ) /\ k e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) -> k e. NN ) |
| 10 | 7, 9 | #P_ffvelrnd | |- ( ( ( A C_ NN /\ M e. NN ) /\ k e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) -> ( ( F ` A ) ` k ) e. RR ) |
| 11 | 1 | #P_rpnnen2lem5 | |- ( ( A C_ NN /\ M e. NN ) -> seq M ( + , ( F ` A ) ) e. dom ~~> ) |
| 12 | 2, 4, 5, 10, 11 | #P_isumrecl | |- ( ( A C_ NN /\ M e. NN ) -> sum_ k e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) ( ( F ` A ) ` k ) e. RR ) |
